While I read the newspapers today, I was very disturbed by the news in the corner of Mustafa Mutlu Bey in Vatan Newspaper.
According to the report, a patient mother of a citizen in Istanbul was unable to be raised to the hospital due to the closure of roads and died on the road
First of all, I wish my condolences to my citizen who lost his mother. Become a paradise for the lover's place, give patience to those who are left behind
It is reported that the roads are closed because of my pass, but this is not true.
According to our citizens, the event was around Levent-Zincirlikuyu between 18-19 on October 8th, so I was in my office in Tarabya during those hours.
On Friday, October 8, at the latest at around 14:30 pm after the Friday prayers were held at the Dolmabahçe Mosque, I returned to Tarabya using the coast road
I would like to share this with you on this occasion
Regardless of the city, I was very sensitive about the interruption of traffic during my transitions and gave very clear instructions on this subject.
My instructions; the flow of traffic is as much as possible without closing the roads, but by taking minimum safety precautions.

Epa how good the program of Alo Presidente. We are already on the 365. Yesterday we were in the valleys ofAragua. Good and Revolutionary Earth!
I repeat it around here. We must connect the city with the field! The earth is the most important of the productive forces. RevoluciónAgraria !!
We must end the oligopolies the Monopolies the Land Concentration in a few months. Let's fight against Capitalism to have a Patric!
He filled me with joy when he saw our Town taking on the commitment of Patria to build agrarian socialism !! Homeland is Land for the People!
Agropatria was born. PureSocialism !! Now we will lower the prices of Seeds and Fertilizers. We will hit the Root of Inflation.AgroRevolution !!
Look. We approve to lower by 49.3% the price of 12 Fertilizers. Also a reduction of 43% in the Price of 260 Agrochemicals. Socialism!
Note this too: the seeds of Caracara, Corn and Rice are going to sell with a reduction of 41.7% of the price. Viva Agropatria socialista!
I commented that we already started with the SUCRE. A deeply liberating currency economically and politically !! South American Union !!
Now we buy soy oil from Evo through the Unified Regional Compensation System SUCRE! Free economically!
With our SUCRE we will break the paradigms of the predatory dollar! Live the Latin American economic independence. It's time for the People!
Greetings to theTechnicians of ChinaWho came toCooperate inTheTechnologicaldesignofAluminium, Steel and Gold projects.Socialism in Power!
I remain a member of the affected families. I have approved 258 million to acquire 1138 homes for these compatriots. Socialism is solidarity!
Yesterday I mentioned it. We are working on the Urgent Legislation for the Regulation of TerrasUrbanas to reinvigorate Housing Construction !!
For example: in the land of Fort Tiuna we will build at least 50 thousand homes for the town. This is only possible in Revolution!

After 68 days with anguish and hope, the moment of truth arrived at the rescue. May God accompany the miners and rescuers
The Chileans said that we would not surrender and comply. We would look for them until we found them and fulfilled them. Q 'we will rescue them and we will fulfill
What a thrill! What happiness! What a pride to be Chilean! And what gratitude with God!

Prime hears the job summary. Thailand is ready to be a fair and equitable future for Thailand. At Bangkok Art Gallery
Summary report of the public hearing. And surveys of the National Bureau of Statistics more than 100,000 samples of the forum and the web pm.go.th.
The survey found 60.3% of the funding shortfall, 59.6% of health benefits, 49.3% of corruption, corruption, 37.7%
The hottest economic problems are capital shortages, high production costs, unstable incomes. Source: National Bureau of Statistics
Quality of life Most distress is natural disasters, drugs, health.
Injustice and politics The most troubling is Political conflict, corruption, violence in 3 southern provinces.
Education is the most painful. Insufficient extra classes for the competition, no chance for children to study in good institutions.
These needs will determine the strategic direction for the reform of Thailand by the working group to achieve concrete plans and measures in Jan 1, 2011.
There is an urgent agenda. Spread the land, reduce the cost of living, the informal economy, anti-corruption, the safety of life and property.
Interested parties can download the document. Thailand Reform Strategy http://bit.ly/cujito

I was very happy that the President of Germany Mr. Wulff and his wife made one of their first visits to Turkey. http://twitpic.com/2zul7m
Actually the visit was spectacular. President Wulff not only saw Istanbul and Ankara but also Anatolia http://twitpic.com/2zumgz
The main reason for not paying much attention to this occasion is that we are close to 3 million Turkish citizens living in Germany. http://twitpic.com/2zun9h
This is the strongest link between our two citizens.
The words of my dear friend Wulff express very concisely the nature of the Turkish-German relations:
"Turks and Germans are both guests and hosts in each other's country." I agree with this view. http://twitpic.com/2zuov4
